climatePledgeFriendly.details: GreenCircle Certified: Certified Energy Savings verifies product energy savings of over 10% in the use-phase compared to similar products.

features: Hypoallergenic. Dermatologist Tested. Free of dyes and perfumes
Each pac of Tide Pods Free & Gentle provides a deeper clean (versus the leading Free detergent) that’s gentle on skin
1 laundry pac for regular loads, 2 pacs for large loads and 3 pacs for extra large loads
Tide PODS laundry pacs dissolve quickly in hot & cold
body.description: Product Description Taking care of sensitive skin doesn’t have to be hard. Each Tide PODS contains breakthrough 3-in-1 laundry solution with super-concentrated detergent, stain remover and color protector that is specially designed free of dyes and perfumes. Simply put in one pac for most loads, but use two pacs for large loads and three pacs for extra large loads. For a simple, worry-free laundry experience that’s gentle on skin, Tide PODS Free & Gentle laundry detergent will keep your family looking and feeling great. It outperformed the leading free detergent on 10 different stains (1). Unlike many other HE detergents that can slow washers down because of too many suds, Tide HE Turbo contains quick collapsing suds and targets tough stains. So you can get amazing results without the extra rinse cycles to remove the suds. (1) under standard single-wash conditions on Polycotton fabric in a standard top-loading washer Brand Story By Tide

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Save 90% of energy on every load on average just by switching from hot to cold. *When using a non-HE machine and switching all loads from hot to cold water, based on average electricity rate of (US, 13.3c/kWh) and 8 loads per week. Specially formulated for cold water conditions to keep clothing looking colorful and bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our itchy skin is gone!
reviews.reviewText: We've had itchy skin since using our last container of Tide, so, it's been a long time. Thought it could be the Bounce fabric softener but heard about the new Tide Free and Gentle. After the first couple of washes the itching was gone and never came back...so impressed, something that works! Didn't want to have to change detergents since Tide cleans so well as far as I'm concerned. Just wish we could buy the pods in a box or bag instead of the big plastic jug, trying to get rid of all this plastic. But product is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value around
reviews.reviewText: As someone with sensitive skin, I can confidently say that Tide Pods Free and Gentle have been a game-changer for my laundry routine. These pods are a convenient and effective way to clean my clothes without causing any irritation. The gentle formula is fragrance-free, hypoallergenic, and free from harsh chemicals, making it safe for my skin. Each pod contains the perfect amount of detergent, ensuring precise and mess-free usage. The cleaning power is impressive, as it removes stains and leaves my clothes fresh and soft. Tide Pods Free and Gentle have made laundry a breeze while keeping my skin happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No irritation to my super sensitive skin and works great even in cold water!
reviews.reviewText: I got the Free & Gentle Tide in liquid form, but I need to lug it into the laundry room, pour it out and measure it. This is handy-dandy and small. Easy to carry. I just throw one in each load, even if they are pretty dirty (smelly socks from hiking, for example). The detergent works great and, like the liquid form, it does not irritate my very sensitive skin (runs in my family...we are all are blessed with very reactive skin and all use unscented laundry detergent). My clothes do seem fresh. I often wash in cold and hang up my clothes to have them last. Only towels and sheets go into the dryer for me. Pro-tip - put the pod on the bottom of your clothes in the HE wash machines. Works much better and dissolves all the way each time for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scent is truly free and our clothes have came out so soft.
reviews.reviewText: We were using Liquid Tide fresh scent. So with our new washing machine our Repair man and the Manual suggested Tide Pods only. So we assumed we could just switch to Fresh Scent Tide Pods made for our machine. The very first load the scent was so overwhelming the fresh scent, I sneezed every time I walked into our laundry room. So I was fairly certain the smell on my husbands hankies would not pass his smell test. I was right, it triggered our allergies. So I thought I would give Tide Pods free and gentle a chance. To my surprise it was very effective, cleaned normal stains and gave the laundry a nice clean smell withoutTriggering our allergies!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No more irritants
reviews.reviewText: Works great though not noticing much fabric softening. Otherwise does as advertised

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Use this to wash my clothes. Put them on and "Mmmm~ that's good". Clean, soft, no skin iritation, smells nice. 11/12, needs more "Mmmm~"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter kept getting a rash from her clothing, and it turned out to be a sensitivity to our old laundry detergent. We switched to this one and haven't looked back, the whole family is better for it. The pods are super easy to use, get everything really clean, but without any of the strong scents or other ingredients that people typically have bad reactions to. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the product and use them all the time, but during the shipping process the packaging was dented on both sides, the lid was off and the pods were shrewd all inside the packaging. I wasn’t happy with that at all but no harm done!! It’s not the seller’s fault. I would still recommend the product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gentle on Clothes, Tough on Stains: Tide PODS Free & Gentle Review
reviews.reviewText: Tide PODS Free & Gentle have become my go-to laundry detergent for a variety of reasons. These liquid pacs offer an exceptional combination of cleaning power, convenience, and a gentle touch that my family and I truly appreciate.First and foremost, the "Free & Gentle" formulation is a game-changer for those with sensitive skin or allergies. It's incredibly gentle on clothing, yet it doesn't compromise on cleaning effectiveness. I've noticed that our clothes feel soft and retain their color, all while being completely free from the irritation often associated with harsh detergents.The convenience of these pacs cannot be overstated. No more measuring or spilling liquid detergent – just toss a pod into the drum and you're good to go. It simplifies the laundry process and reduces the risk of overusing detergent. It's especially handy for college students or busy professionals.Despite the gentle nature of these pods, they are tough on stains. I've been pleasantly surprised by their stain-removing abilities, whether it's a coffee spill or grass stains on my children's clothes. They effectively tackle a wide range of stains, which is a big plus for families with active lifestyles.The fresh and clean scent these pods impart to our laundry is also appreciated. It's not overpowering but leaves clothes smelling pleasantly clean and vibrant.One potential drawback is the price, as Tide PODS can be more expensive than traditional liquid detergents. However, I've found that the convenience and stain-fighting abilities are well worth the investment.In summary, Tide PODS Free & Gentle Laundry Detergent Liquid Pacs are a fantastic addition to any laundry routine. They offer the perfect blend of gentleness, convenience, and stain-fighting power. If you have sensitive skin or simply want a laundry detergent that simplifies your life and keeps your clothes looking and feeling great, these pacs are an excellent choice. They've made a noticeable difference in our laundry routine, and I wouldn't consider switching to anything else.

reviews.reviewTitle: No scent is the way to go.
reviews.reviewText: Not much to say really, they don't stink, and get my laundry clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 21, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Great product but way too expensive! We thought we’d get at least 3 bags but only got 1. Never buying this again from this shop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 30, 2019
